text: Aniatachu neinunngei alekti chunga demna nang ko dôn: nin lâia mi senkhatin Balaam minchuna chong an pom sikin. Ha mi han mirmilngei biekna neinun an pêk ngei hah an sâkna rang le inditnasaloi an songna rangin Balak hah Israel mingei sietna tieng tipuiraia minjôtna chang a minchu ani.2:14: Tel 22:5,7; 31:16; Bal 23:4; Tel 25:1-3
